name: cdkoutputs2sh
description: CLI tool and library that converts AWS CDK stack output JSON files into sourceable shell environment variable export scripts

scripts.init: pnpm i && pnpm run build && pnpm run link
scripts.lint:full: biome lint . --fix && shopt -s globstar && tsc --noEmit src/**/*.ts
scripts.format:full: npm pkg fix && biome format --write . && dprint fmt && textlint --fix "**/*.md"
scripts.security: trivy fs --skip-dirs node_modules,cdk.out . && trivy config --skip-dirs node_modules,cdk.out .
scripts.audit: pnpm audit && trivy fs --scanners vuln package.json

author: heiwa4126 <heiwa4126@gmail.com>
